comments.author: Dr Ishmael.9685
comments.body: It’s a custom markup tag for applying specific color to bits of text. They used it in GW1 originally. Healix explained how it works.

comments.author: Healix.5819
comments.body: <c=?>text</c> means that “text” will be displayed using the color “?”. In your example “?” is the variable @flavor, which is whatever color flavor text is. In other cases, it may be in hex <c=#000000>black</c>
